intro.description:
Each view also has its own mini-toolbar which provides functionality specific to that view.
1. Click anywhere on the NELSON track in the boat1.rep editor; the details of that track will appear in the Outline view.
2. In the Outline view, click on Track:NELSON to select it.
3. In the Outline view's mini-toolbar, click on the empty check box, second from the right-end—the Nelson track in the plot editor will disappear.
4. In the same mini-toolbar, click on the check box with the tick in it—the Nelson track will reappear.
